Openglad is the open sourced version of Gladiator. A bunch of people
created a group called Snowstorm Entertainment and started up a project to
make a clone of Gladiator. Someone found the project, posted it here,
then Tom Ricket saw it and open sourced Gladiator. Snowstorm changed their
goal from cloning to porting the old Gladiator to modern operating
systems, and Openglad was born.

Openglad runs on 5 OS'es (Linux, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, BeOS, and Windows) and
currently features slightly better graphics (on everything but BeOS) and
better joystick handling (at least under Linux) than the original. Work is
currently underway for a modern graphic format, resolution options, and
class scripting. We'll get to other things later, too.

Bjorn already posted the site URL, so go check it out. Its pretty cool :-)

- Zardus
